commit.message:
typeck.c (invalid_nonstatic_memfn_p): Use DECL_NONSTATIC_MEMBER_FUNCTION_P.

2009-01-29  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	* typeck.c (invalid_nonstatic_memfn_p): Use
	DECL_NONSTATIC_MEMBER_FUNCTION_P.
